Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Stalker \Stalk"er\ (st[add]k"[~e]r), n. 1. One who stalks. [1913 Webster]
2. A kind of fishing net. [1913 Webster]
stalker n 1: someone who walks with long stiff strides 2: someone who stalks game 3: someone who prowls or sneaks about; usually with unlawful intentions [syn: {prowler}, {sneak}]
